title: ThoughtLeaders.io
description: Our platform helps brands leverage the power of YouTube creators to reach new audiences and grow their business. As industry leaders specializing in YouTube sponsorships, we have pinpointed the most important data metrics to determine what a brand should spend to maximize their ROI, while paying creators a fair rate. Discover new creators, find sponsorship prices, create customized searches, generate outreach strategies, and book sponsorships—all in one seamless platform.
